pull.title: move-only: PASTE macros to util/macros.h
pull.body: Really dumb move-only stolen from #16805. Some of my pull requests also depend on this, so I split it up to not depend on #16805.

events.body: ACK 0d86f4d3dacab38f3cd5371d0c920585c178302c, I have reviewed the code and it looks OK, I agree it can be merged.

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.

issue.title: partial bitcoin#15638, #21966, #16889, merge #14555, #20499, #14074, #17073: util refactoring
issue.body:
## Contents

bitcoin#14074, bitcoin#14555, bitcoin#17073, bitcoin#20499

### Partials

bitcoin#15638, bitcoin#21966, bitcoin#16889

## Notes

_With scripted diffs with the command used available in the commit message, drop the `g` from `gsed` if you're not running macOS. This is a work in progress, more scripted refactoring to follow._
